Summary: Bright Fire like orbs that changed shapes, I yell at my daughter to come out the apartment/ garage downstairs, she comes out and we saw what I describe below
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around December 6th 2012
divs: sighting detailscat was meowing out my window. went out to the porch to feed her. sat down and was petting her. lit a cigarette and sat down. out of the corner of my eye i see bright lights. i first thought 2 bengala lights, so bright! fire in the sky, ufo? thursday 12\6\12, 2:20 am, cloudy and overcast, not one star visible. my daughter nicole and i saw these objects in the sky that we could not identify. their movement, sharp short turns left and right, up and down in synchronicity, intense fire like subtle changing shapes and size, then they just poof!, disappeared one at a time. by the time i scrambled inside shacking to get the camera and came back outside, this is all i could capture. we were just astonished and exited.
